articles.author: Andrew Wright
articles.title: Rio Ferdinand on Newcastle United's European exit - 'At this level you have to punish teams' - Eurosport COM
articles.description: Rio Ferdinand said Newcastle United were made to pay for not capitalising on their first-half dominance against AC Milan in the UEFA Champions League.
articles.content:
Bruno Guimaraes of Newcastle United is dejected after the UEFA Champions League match between Newcastle United FC and AC Milan at St. James Park on December 13, 2023.
Image credit: Getty Images

articles.title: Eight years of conservative rule in Poland ends as Donald Tusk becomes prime minister - The Associated Press
articles.description: The new Polish Prime Minister Donald Tusk has been sworn in by the president in a ceremony where each of his ministers was also taking the oath of office. The swearing-in ceremony of the pro-European Union government on Wednesday morning marks the final step …
articles.content: WARSAW, Poland (AP) The new Polish Prime Minister Donald Tusk and his Cabinet were sworn in by the president on Wednesday morning, in a ceremony which marked the end of eight tumultuous years of rule… [+2840 chars]

articles.author: Annette Weisbach
articles.title: European Central Bank to focus on shrinking balance sheet as markets bet on rate cuts - CNBC
articles.description: Money markets are currently pricing in almost 150 basis points of rate cuts next year.
articles.content:
Christine Lagarde, president of the European Central Bank (ECB).
